Rise of Kingdoms
My project is  focused on explaining the game to the user as well as having him intrigued to play. With use of  HTML,CSS,BOOTSTRAP whole project looks  appealing to the eye, easy to use and filled with neccessary information needed to start the game.



UX

This website is for users who spend most of their  time on mobile phones, since it is a mobile game. This project is actually made as  database of information  needed for the game, since  its  practically new game  there isnt any  proper databases and therefore this is a great tool  in order  for users to helpthemselves  be better and stronger.
User wants to get information  on  commander development and  list of  all legendary commanders. He just needs to click  Commander button and page opens with all TIPS needed to develop commanders fast as well as  list of legenedary, epic,elite,advanced commanders in game.
User wants to know what are rules of Lost Kingdom,  simply press the button, it explains what is Lost kingdom  and  there are  listed  main rules  of participation in lost kingdom. Also as extra bonus there is provided map of Lost kingdom area.
If user is interested in  Ark of Osiris rules, simply click ark  button  and  all the rules as well as map will be provided on web page.


I was using Balsamiq mockups3, recommended by my mentor.
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pFnGGzrFh2K1Roh2dxSjSalz2mJLvo2K?usp=sharing    this is link where you can  see the  wireframe/mockup. Which developed  and adapted  to  current  look of  page.


Features

In this section, you should go over the different parts of your project, and describe each in a sentence or so.

Existing Features
Social link--  allowes users  to be redirected  to  offical pages,servers, profiles of  the game by pressing  the icon of desired platform.

Possible  plan in futured to add  under commander  button is  with main  commander page, a menu  where you can select each category  of commanders  and it would show you names, once pressed it would redirect you  and  give you detailed information about each commander.
In ark of osiris, add more content( pictures, once clicked it would open  additional information on each strucutre in event)
For Lost Kingdom  a time table   of  all events from beggining to the end  with all neccessary information.




Technologies Used

HTML
CSS
Bootstrap
Font awesome
Jquery


Testing

Home page:
press any button you will be lead  to different webpage
On any of those webpages  you press a different or same button you will be redirected.
Responsivness, by inspecting  each page  in any  mode( mobile , tablet, desktop) everything scales, from navigation bar, text, pictures to contact form, and footer.

Whole CSS was validated  and tested through https://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator // Congratulations! No Error Found. This document validates as CSS level 3 + SVG !
Every  HTML was checked  via https://validator.w3.org/nu/   There were mistakes with closing tags  which were all fixed.


Deployment
Deployment of  project went through GitHub,  as project was being made GitHub was regularly  pushed. So  there is no difference between  deployed  or developed version.
There is a folder  which is not being used  at all in project. It was  easier to  use direct links of  pictures.
